          <title>
            <string language="en">Lime juice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Limettensaft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jus de limette</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Suco de cal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Succo di cedro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χυμός ασβέστη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Jugo de cal</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This cartoon illustrates Captain Cook giving his sailors lime juice to keep them  healthy and prevent diseases. Lime juice contains vitamin C.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">captain cook</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">disease</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Karikatur veranschaulicht Kapitän Cook, der
seinen Seeleuten Limettensaft gibt, um sie gesund zu halten und 
Krankheiten zu verhindern. Limettensaft enthält Vitamin C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce dessin animé illustre capitaine Cook donnant 
à ses marins le jus de limette pour les maintenir sains et pour 
empêcher les maladies. Le jus de limette contient la vitamine 
C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este cartoon ilustra o capitão Cozinhar que dá a
seus sailors o suco de cal para mantê-los saudáveis e para impedir 
doenças. O suco de cal contem a vitamina C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo fumetto illustra il capitano Cook che dà 
ai suoi marinai il succo di cedro per mantenerli sani e per impedire 
le malattie. Il succo di cedro contiene la vitamina C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα κινούμενα σχέδια επεξηγούν τον καπετάνιο 
Cook που δίνει το χυμό ασβέστη ναυτικών του για να τους 
κρατήσουν υγιείς και να αποτρέψουν τις ασθένειες. Ο χυμός 
ασβέστη περιέχει τη βιταμίνη C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta historieta ilustra a capitán Cook que da a 
sus marineros el jugo de cal para mantenerlos sanos y para prevenir 
enfermedades. El jugo de cal contiene vitamina C.</string>
          </description>
